text: Kirby has to be one of the most consistently good video game series. The games always get solid 8/10s from the press. I wouldn't call myself the biggest Kirby fan but I certainly enjoy everything I've played so far. To me, the best thing about the series is Jun Ishikawa's music, he never disappoints even after all these years.
author: SupraDarky

text: His music always gives this vibe of nostalgic happiness. Thats the best way i can describe it XD
author: Louie LouieShow

text: Yeah, it's funny how Kirby games might not be considered the best  videogames ever, but they're never bad, unlike others like... say, Zelda, which has games a lot of fans don't like, or Metroid, which has Other M lol. And the music's "childish" feel give you kind of a nostalgic feeling.
author: Alfonso ST

text: So far as we're talking mainline titles, I've never not enjoyed a Kirby game.
author: EvilMariobot

text:
I feel like the Kirby series should slow down releases to create something really special again. It's a pretty samey series.

Still good, but I feel like a masterpiece could happen with a little more care.
author: minty
